thread.title: Lady Gaga & Taylor Kinney Spice Up American Horor Story: Hotel's Red Carpet With PDA
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga & Taylor Kinney Spice Up American Horor Story: Hotel's Red Carpet With PDA

title: Lady Gaga & Taylor Kinney Spice Up American Horor Story: Hotel's Red Carpet With PDA
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Lady Gaga and her fiance, Taylor Kinney could not keep hands off each other at the American Horror Story: Hotel premiere red carpet on Saturday, Oct. 3 in L.A. 
The 29-year-old pop singer stars in the fifth season of the hit FX series, and attended the new season's premiere with her fiance looking red hot. 
Lady Gaga looked gorgeous on the American Horror Story: Hotel red carpet in a stunning red Brandon Maxwell gown. She was accompanied by her fiance, Taylor Kinney, who looked dapper in all black. 
Image Courtesy of Twitter 
Gaga and Taylor got engaged this Valentine's Day and she announced it by sharing a pic of her glittering heart-shaped diamond rock on Instagram saying, "He gave me his heart on Valentine's Day, and I said YES." 
The engaged couple could not stay away from each other and showed major PDA on the AHS red carpet. 
Image Courtesy of Twitter 
Apart from holding hands, Taylor and Lady Gaga also shared some kisses which made all the mother monster fans fall all the more in love with the couple. 
Image Courtesy of Twitter 
The Grammy winning singer plays the bloodsucking hotel proprietor 'The Countess' in the new season of the hit horror show. She shared an Instagram photo of herself on Saturday, drinking out of a blue straw. "Some people just like to drink blood for fun. #ahspremiere #ahsfans #ahshotel," she captioned the pic. 
American Horror Story: Hotel premieres on Wednesday, Oct. 7, at 10 p.m. on FX.
